author: ebourg
msg: Removed the usage of the nestable exceptions from commons lang (exceptions are nestable by default since the JDK 1.4)

author: doll
msg: Made the samplecontainer more spec compliant.
- activities are now validated for title or titleId
- app data keys now have their chars restricted

author: ebourg
msg: Removed the workarounds related to the JDK 1.3 compatibility

author: ebourg
msg: Removed the dependencies on Xerces, Xalan and xml-api
Updated the documentation to reflect the move to Java 5 as the minimum requirement

author: markt
msg: Add a file to track possible 6.2 features so I can refer to it from the wiki.
